metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1334 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
attach.c in LXC 1.1.2 and earlier uses the proc filesystem in a container, which allows local container users to escape AppArmor or SELinux confinement by mounting a proc filesystem with a crafted (1) AppArmor profile or (2) SELinux label.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1334` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblxc1 - 1.0.7-0ubuntu0.2
lxc - 1.0.7-0ubuntu0.2
lxc-templates - 1.0.7-0ubuntu0.2
lxc-tests - 1.0.7-0ubuntu0.2
python3-lxc - 1.0.7-0ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lxc package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.7-0ubuntu0.2').
